item.description: In a significant development for the European artificial intelligence sector, Paris-based startup Mistral AI has achieved a noteworthy milestone. item.title: .NET Chiselled Ubuntu Container Images Are Now Generally Available
item.description: At the end of November, the .NET chiselled Ubuntu container images achieved general availability. Microsoft announced that images are now suitable for production to use across .NET 6, 7, and 8 versions. Stating that chiselled images are the result of a long-term partnership and design collaboration between Canonical and Microsoft.
